issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Unless I'm doing it wrong... See my test android/res-img-oom -- it uses platform specific image file which in a real mobile app would go in Resources/android/images/medium/test.png. In Drillbit, processing just stops at "init" phase.

{html}
fields.summary: Drillbit: platform-specific resource subfolders don't get created and their files copied

comments.body:
{html}

(from [f05d05a7d4fa05589ca94aca56be3ca48086079e]) create parent directories of test ad-hoc folders if they don't already exist [#2315 state:fixed-in-qa] https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/f05d05a7d4fa...

{html}
